mapper.select: SELECT A.ORDER_NUM, A.MEMBER_NUM, A.GOODS_NUM, SUM(A.ORDER_AMOUNT), A.ORDER_DATE, A.ORDER_PRICE, A.ORDER_PAYMENT, B.GOODS_NAME, D.GOODS_IMG1, C.MEMBER_ID FROM ORDERS A, GOODS B, MEMBER C, GOODS_IMG D WHERE AND A.MEMBER_NUM = C.MEMBER_NUM AND A.GOODS_NUM = B.GOODS_NUM AND B.GOODS_NUM = D.GOODS_NUM GROUP BY A.ORDER_NUM, A.MEMBER_NUM, A.GOODS_NUM, A.ORDER_DATE, A.ORDER_PRICE, A.ORDER_PAYMENT,B.GOODS_NAME, D.GOODS_IMG1, C.MEMBER_ID ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC, ORDER_NUM DESC
SELECT COUNT(ORDER_NUM) FROM ORDERS ORDER BY ORDER_NUM DESC

SELECT O.ORDER_NUM, O.ORDER_AMOUNT, O.MEMBER_NUM, O.GOODS_NUM, O.ORDER_DATE, O.ORDER_PRICE, O.ORDER_PAYMENT FROM ORDERS O, MEMBER M WHERE M.MEMBER_NUM=O.MEMBER_NUM and M.member_id LIKE '%'|| #{searchkeyword} || '%'
SELECT ORDER_NUM, ORDER_AMOUNT, MEMBER_NUM, GOODS_NUM, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_PRICE, ORDER_PAYMENT, ORDER_ECHECK FROM ORDERS WHERE ORDER_PAYMENT=#{ORDER_PAYMENT};

SELECT M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, M.MEMBER_PHONE, G.GOODS_NAME, G.GOODS_PRICE, G.GOODS_DCPRICE, O.ORDER_AMOUNT FROM GOODS G, MEMBER M, ORDERS O WHERE O.GOODS_NUM = G.GOODS_NUM AND O.MEMBER_NUM = M.MEMBER_NUM AND O.MEMBER_NUM=#{MEMBER_NUM} AND O.GOODS_NUM=#{GOODS_NUM};
